description.plain:
Nir Tibor (Hebrew: ניר טיבור), better known by his stage name Dennis Lloyd, is an alternative R&B music producer, singer and trumpeter based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

His first single ‘Playa (Say That)’ was released in mid 2015 and gained reviews world wide.
In late 2015, Tibor decided to move to Bangkok, Thailand for one year in order to work on his music.

During 12 months in BKK, Tibor had recorded over 30 original songs, performed in the Wonderfruit Festival (Pattaya) and filmed 3 music videos.
His singles ‘Snow White’ and ‘Nevermind’ were featured in commercials of Don’t Tell Mama clothing brand.

‘Nevermind’, Lloyd’s breakout song was certified platinum by RIAA, reached the first place on all of the Israeli weekly charts and was streamed more than 500 milion times on Spotify. ‘Nevermind’ caused Lloyd’s success at the same year in Israel and all around the world.

‘Nevermind’ was also featured by the Israeli radio station ECO 99FM in their playlist ‘New & Correct’. His songs ‘Way Out’ and ‘Demons’ were played by Kol Hacampus 106FM radio station.

His hit-single ‘Never Go Back’ was certified gold by SNEP and reached the first place on the Israeli weekly charts of Media Forest and Galgalatz. the song was included on Lloyd’s debut EP Exident. ‘Never Go Back’ was also the name of Lloyd’s first world tour.

Nir Tibor (Hebrew: ניר טיבור), better known by his stage name Dennis Lloyd, is an alternative R&B music producer, singer and trumpeter based in Tel Aviv, Israel.

His first single ‘Playa (Say That)’ was released in mid 2015 and gained reviews world wide.
In late 2015, Tibor decided to move to Bangkok, Thailand for one year in order to work on his music.

During 12 months in BKK, Tibor had recorded over 30 original songs, performed in the Wonderfruit Festival (Pattaya) and filmed 3 music videos.
His singles ‘Snow White’ and ‘Nevermind’ were featured in commercials of Don’t Tell Mama clothing brand.

‘Nevermind’, Lloyd’s breakout song was certified platinum by RIAA, reached the first place on all of the Israeli weekly charts and was streamed more than 500 milion times on Spotify. ‘Nevermind’ caused Lloyd’s success at the same year in Israel and all around the world.

‘Nevermind’ was also featured by the Israeli radio station ECO 99FM in their playlist ‘New & Correct’. His songs ‘Way Out’ and ‘Demons’ were played by Kol Hacampus 106FM radio station.

His hit-single ‘Never Go Back’ was certified gold by SNEP and reached the first place on the Israeli weekly charts of Media Forest and Galgalatz. the song was included on Lloyd’s debut EP Exident. ‘Never Go Back’ was also the name of Lloyd’s first world tour.

songs.title: Nevermind

description.plain:
“Nevermind” is a song by Israeli musician and singer Dennis Lloyd.
The song was released on September 18th, 2016, and got a remix that got popular in 2018.

songs.embed_content: Read “Nevermind” by Dennis Lloyd on Genius

The song was released on September 18th, 2016, and got a remix that got popular in 2018.

songs.title: Playa (Say That)

description.plain: Dennis Lloyd’s 2015 single is a painful and profanity-laced smooth electric song that covers a toxic relationship where Lloyd’s partner cheated on him.

songs.embed_content: Read “Playa (Say That)” by Dennis Lloyd on Genius
